articles.title: Long-range regulation of tumor suppressor genes plays key role in cancer
articles.description: Enhancers are regulatory elements that play an important role in cancer.Researchers from Rutgers Cancer Institute of New Jersey, the state's only National Cancer Institute-designated Comprehensive Cancer Center, identified a novel enhancer.

articles.content:
New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy suggested on Tuesday that stalled efforts to pass a new federal stimulus package could be standing in the way of public health restrictions that would shut down businesses to mitigate the spread of COVID-19.

articles.title: Ivanka and Jared Look for a New Beginning As Their D.C. Days Dwindle
articles.description: The end of President Trump’s time in office leaves his daughter Ivanka Trump and his son-in-law, Jared Kushner, as well-to-do refugees — but they appear to have plans in New Jersey.
articles.content: The small student body leans heavily toward the progeny of public servants and diplomats derided by Mr. Trump as the “Deep State,” and the Kushners’ enrollment created the kind of heated divide that has trailed the Trumps over the past four years. So... [2236 chars]

articles.title: New Jersey governor requires all cops wear body cameras
articles.description: The move follows a summer of racial justice protests in response to the police killing of George Floyd in Minneapolis.
articles.content: But the program has not been a cure-all. An NYPD watchdog agency reported in February that some cops were giving subtle cues to their fellow officers that cameras were on, possibly in an attempt to stop filming instances of misconduct....

articles.title: WORLD: OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma pleads guilty in criminal case
articles.description: In a virtual hearing with a federal judge in Newark, New Jersey, the OxyContin maker admitted impeding the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration's efforts to combat the addiction crisis
articles.content:
